item.title: Football Fans Are Making A Pre-New Year's Toast To These 'Deranged,' 'Sexy' Pop-Tart Mascots
item.description: "And now it's time for America's Greatest Tradition: murdering a Pop Tart on live TV."

item.title: New Jersey Sinkhole Shuts Down Interstate Lanes, Reveals Abandoned Mine
item.description: The highway's guardrail was suspended in the air across the gaping 40-foot-wide hole, which opened up when an abandoned mine collapsed under the right...
